Property Location
Located in Shenzhen (Nanshan), Southern-Inn is close to Shenzhen University and Xin'an Nantou Ancient City. This hotel is within close proximity of Shekou Ferry Terminal and Zhongshan Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 129 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 2 PM
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
